title: Popular interest in technology is declining, but tech giants aren't going anywhere - AppleInsider
content: Popular interest in technology is declining, but tech giants aren't going anywhere  AppleInsider
description: Overall interest in Apple products and the technology industry at large have been on a downturn for years. While there is no obvious short-term impact, big tech has already begun shifting away some of its financial power and focus away from hardware and onto greener pastures.
